short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your personalized hydration companion! Get timely reminders, track your intake, and prioritize your health with Drink Water Reminder

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drink Water Reminder for Chrome: Elevate your hydration habits. Ensure you stay refreshed, focused, and healthy by consistently meeting your water intake goals.

Why Choose Drink Water Reminder?

Consistent Hydration: With Drink Water Reminder, receive timely alerts ensuring you never forget to hydrate.

Customizable Alerts: Set intervals that fit your routine and select from a variety of tunes, making your reminder for drinking water a delightful experience.

Effortless Intake Tracking: Monitor your daily water intake with our intuitive system. Celebrate your hydration milestones and see your progress.
Integrated Chrome Experience: No external apps needed. Drink Water Reminder integrates seamlessly with your browser.
FAQs:

Adjusting Frequency: Customize Drink Water Reminder to your hydration needs.
Multiple Glasses: Click multiple times to mark each glass you drink.
Daily Tracking Limit: Track from 8 glasses to 20 or more. We've got you covered.
